quote: I have to be careful not to do so many comedy airhead roles from now on. I've turned down a couple already.

I have to be careful what I eat before going onstage, to avoid an upset stomach.
My top styling tips for brides are, first and foremost, to be careful not to go overboard with makeup. The goal is to look like yourself, just a bit enhanced!
Be careful not to start a company that really belongs as a feature of another company, like the 25 Twitter URL shortener companies out there. Pick a real problem that's here to stay.

You need to be careful with a Bluetooth headset. Because some guys look crazy with them.

Be careful about the advice you give, especially to your children.
Actually, most things I say in public lead more or less directly to my own compositional practice, so I should be careful about generalizing lest they come back to haunt me.
If it takes you 20 or 25 years to establish yourself in one field, you really ought to be careful not to stray too far.

I do believe in beauty foods - like, a lot of blueberries, salmon, kale, quinoa, avocado.

Soaps are a great springboard for any actor but if you want to be taken seriously, you have to be careful.

Because I don't have to be careful of people's feelings when I teach literature, and I do when I'm teaching writing.

I think you have to be careful not to do too much as yourself. Otherwise you stop getting the acting roles, and at the end of the day that's what I love.

If the ability to do that was taken away from me, I'd go barmy. You lose your freedom. Be careful what you wish for.
